original_text: But Festus answered, that Paul should be kept at Caesarea, and that he himself would depart shortly thither.
korean_text: 베스도가 대답하여 바울이 가이사랴에 구류된 것과 자기도 멀지 않아 떠나갈 것을 말하고

sentences.original_text: that Paul should be kept at Caesarea
and that he himself would depart shortly thither
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 자신도 곧 그곳으로 떠날 것이라고
